Harper Reed: Technology and death metal

Hacking, Baphomet and the real time internet
Hi. I am an engineer who builds paradigm-shifting tech and leads others to do the same. I love using the enormity of the Internet to bring people together, whether as CTO of Obama for America, CTO at Threadless.com, or on my own projects. You can often find me playing with new technology, looking for something to hack, or enjoying life in Chicago with my amazing wife, Hiromi. Check out my homepage and follow me on twitter.

So
Posted on Jul 19, 2002

i guess conagra, the company behind the beef industry in my home town, recently recalled 18.6 million pounds of ground beef. wtf. it is insanity. I hope no one dies. An interesting article about the beef industry is here. It mentions greeley a couple times - especially in regard to the number of cows it slaughters per hour and how the increase in numbe rof cows.. has increased the likelyhood for beef contamination. weird huh. something like that woudl never happen.

and in a shocking move, the world's poorest nations lash out at richest. Nobody expected that! but like always.. our esteemed military ispracticing to fight "evil" countries such as that.. luckly for us.
